function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in service contexts at micro-, meso-, and macro-levels.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of diseases within service environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and regular disinfection of service areas.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV-C disinfection devices, and air purification systems.","People":"Customers, staff, and business owners in service contexts.","Owner":"Business owners, management, and relevant health authorities."}]}
